name: Your Regime
description:
Play as the Leader of autocratic state. Use your folders to make decisions in different areas. Complete all endings to get Bonus track.

Game state:

- Fully playable

- Lack of visuals

- Not all in-game reports are clear

- Possible great amount of mistakes in texts

Planned improvements for post-compo version:

- Redefine balance

- Fix all texts and reports

- Localizations

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50 theme 'Delay the inevitable''.
